title: The Evolution of vascular plants: the ferns
brief_description: Describes the evolution of vascular systems in land plants. The highly specialised structures that occur in vascular plants are shown through investigation of the fern. The film explains the adaptive advantages of vascular systems in land plants, and shows how biologists reconstruct the story of the plant evolution by studying fossils and living plants.
